QuestData.Title: Blood Theory
QuestData.Description: The land is not all that has changed in Desolace. Here, the wildlife has responded to their new environment in strange and sometimes exciting ways.$b$bI am particularly interested in the Rejuvenated Thunder Lizards that roam just to the west.$b$bI need a sample of their blood.$b$bYou may begin helping me by using this jar of leeches on a few of them.$b$bOnce they've filled on the blood of those beasts, return them to me.
QuestData.CompletionText: Were you able to recover the samples I require?
